title: Wrapper class for the GROMACS pdb2gmx (http://manual.gromacs.org/current/onlinehelp/gmx-pdb2gmx.html) module.

input_pdb_path.description: Path to the input PDB file.

output_gro_path.description: Path to the output GRO file.

output_top_zip_path.description: Path the output TOP topology in zip format.

output_top_path.description: Path of the output TOP file.

output_itp_path.description: Path of the output itp file.

water_type.description: Water molecule type. Valid values: spc, spce, tip3p, tip4p, tip5p, tips3p.

force_field.description: Force field to be used during the conversion. Valid values: gromos45a3, charmm27, gromos53a6, amber96, amber99, gromos43a2, gromos54a7, gromos43a1, amberGS, gromos53a5, amber99sb, amber03, amber99sb-ildn, oplsaa, amber94.

ignh.description: Should pdb2gmx ignore the hidrogens in the original structure.

gmx_path.description: Path to the GROMACS executable binary.

restart.description: [WF property] Do not execute if output files exist.

container_path.description: Path to the binary executable of your container.

container_volume_path.description: Path to an internal directory in the container.

container_working_dir.description: Path to the internal CWD in the container.

container_user_id.description: User number id to be mapped inside the container.

container_shell_path.description: Path to the binary executable of the container shell.
